<h2 class="pdoc-module-header" id="Accelerator">
<a class="pdoc-member-name" href="https://github.com/pulumi/pulumi-aws/blob/a998eb1436459bca87792641e7c9fb49e4a5e61c/sdk/nodejs/globalaccelerator/accelerator.ts#L27">class <b>Accelerator</b></a>
</h2>
<div class="pdoc-module-contents" markdown="1">
<pre class="highlight"><span class='kd'>extends</span> <a href='https://pulumi.io/reference/pkg/nodejs/@pulumi/pulumi/#CustomResource'>CustomResource</a></pre>

Provides a Global Accelerator accelerator.

## Example Usage

```typescript
import * as pulumi from "@pulumi/pulumi";
import * as aws from "@pulumi/aws";

const example = new aws.globalaccelerator.Accelerator("example", {
    attributes: {
        flowLogsEnabled: true,
        flowLogsS3Bucket: "example-bucket",
        flowLogsS3Prefix: "flow-logs/",
    },
    enabled: true,
    ipAddressType: "IPV4",
});
```

<h2 class="pdoc-module-header" id="Listener">
<a class="pdoc-member-name" href="https://github.com/pulumi/pulumi-aws/blob/a998eb1436459bca87792641e7c9fb49e4a5e61c/sdk/nodejs/globalaccelerator/listener.ts#L36">class <b>Listener</b></a>
</h2>
<div class="pdoc-module-contents" markdown="1">
<pre class="highlight"><span class='kd'>extends</span> <a href='https://pulumi.io/reference/pkg/nodejs/@pulumi/pulumi/#CustomResource'>CustomResource</a></pre>

Provides a Global Accelerator listener.

## Example Usage

```typescript
import * as pulumi from "@pulumi/pulumi";
import * as aws from "@pulumi/aws";

const exampleAccelerator = new aws.globalaccelerator.Accelerator("example", {
    attributes: {
        flowLogsEnabled: true,
        flowLogsS3Bucket: "example-bucket",
        flowLogsS3Prefix: "flow-logs/",
    },
    enabled: true,
    ipAddressType: "IPV4",
});
const exampleListener = new aws.globalaccelerator.Listener("example", {
    acceleratorArn: exampleAccelerator.id,
    clientAffinity: "SOURCE_IP",
    portRanges: [{
        fromPort: 80,
        toPort: 80,
    }],
    protocol: "TCP",
});
```

<h3 class="pdoc-member-header" id="Listener-acceleratorArn">
<a class="pdoc-child-name" href="https://github.com/pulumi/pulumi-aws/blob/a998eb1436459bca87792641e7c9fb49e4a5e61c/sdk/nodejs/globalaccelerator/listener.ts#L52">property <b>acceleratorArn</b></a>
</h3>
<div class="pdoc-member-contents" markdown="1">
<pre class="highlight"><span class='kd'>public </span>acceleratorArn: <a href='https://pulumi.io/reference/pkg/nodejs/@pulumi/pulumi/#Output'>pulumi.Output</a>&lt;<span class='kd'><a href='https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/String'>string</a></span>&gt;;</pre>

The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of your accelerator.

</div>
<h3 class="pdoc-member-header" id="Listener-clientAffinity">
<a class="pdoc-child-name" href="https://github.com/pulumi/pulumi-aws/blob/a998eb1436459bca87792641e7c9fb49e4a5e61c/sdk/nodejs/globalaccelerator/listener.ts#L56">property <b>clientAffinity</b></a>
</h3>
<div class="pdoc-member-contents" markdown="1">
<pre class="highlight"><span class='kd'>public </span>clientAffinity: <a href='https://pulumi.io/reference/pkg/nodejs/@pulumi/pulumi/#Output'>pulumi.Output</a>&lt;<span class='kd'><a href='https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/String'>string</a></span> | <span class='kd'><a href='https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/undefined'>undefined</a></span>&gt;;</pre>

Direct all requests from a user to the same endpoint. Valid values are `NONE`, `SOURCE_IP`. Default: `NONE`. If `NONE`, Global Accelerator uses the "five-tuple" properties of source IP address, source port, destination IP address, destination port, and protocol to select the hash value. If `SOURCE_IP`, Global Accelerator uses the "two-tuple" properties of source (client) IP address and destination IP address to select the hash value.

</div>

<a class="pdoc-child-name" href="https://github.com/pulumi/pulumi-aws/blob/a998eb1436459bca87792641e7c9fb49e4a5e61c/sdk/nodejs/node_modules/@pulumi/pulumi/resource.d.ts#L102">property <b>id</b></a>

id is the provider-assigned unique ID for this managed resource.  It is set during
deployments and may be missing (undefined) during planning phases.

</div>

    toPort: <span class='kd'><a href='https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/Number'>number</a></span>;
}[]&gt;;</pre>

The list of port ranges for the connections from clients to the accelerator. Fields documented below.

</div>
<h3 class="pdoc-member-header" id="Listener-protocol">
<a class="pdoc-child-name" href="https://github.com/pulumi/pulumi-aws/blob/a998eb1436459bca87792641e7c9fb49e4a5e61c/sdk/nodejs/globalaccelerator/listener.ts#L64">property <b>protocol</b></a>

<div class="pdoc-member-contents" markdown="1">

</div>

<h2 class="pdoc-module-header" id="AcceleratorArgs">

<h3 class="pdoc-member-header" id="AcceleratorArgs-attributes">
<a class="pdoc-child-name" href="https://github.com/pulumi/pulumi-aws/blob/a998eb1436459bca87792641e7c9fb49e4a5e61c/sdk/nodejs/globalaccelerator/accelerator.ts#L123">property <b>attributes</b></a>
</h3>

<pre class="highlight"><span class='kd'></span>attributes?: <a href='https://pulumi.io/reference/pkg/nodejs/@pulumi/pulumi/#Input'>pulumi.Input</a>&lt;{

<h3 class="pdoc-member-header" id="AcceleratorArgs-enabled">
<a class="pdoc-child-name" href="https://github.com/pulumi/pulumi-aws/blob/a998eb1436459bca87792641e7c9fb49e4a5e61c/sdk/nodejs/globalaccelerator/accelerator.ts#L127">property <b>enabled</b></a>
</h3>
<div class="pdoc-member-contents" markdown="1">
<pre class="highlight"><span class='kd'></span>enabled?: <a href='https://pulumi.io/reference/pkg/nodejs/@pulumi/pulumi/#Input'>pulumi.Input</a>&lt;<span class='kd'><a href='https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/Boolean'>boolean</a></span>&gt;;</pre>

Indicates whether the accelerator is enabled. The value is true or false. The default value is true.

</div>
<h3 class="pdoc-member-header" id="AcceleratorArgs-ipAddressType">
<a class="pdoc-child-name" href="https://github.com/pulumi/pulumi-aws/blob/a998eb1436459bca87792641e7c9fb49e4a5e61c/sdk/nodejs/globalaccelerator/accelerator.ts#L131">property <b>ipAddressType</b></a>

The value for the address type must be `IPV4`.

</div>

<h2 class="pdoc-module-header" id="ListenerArgs">
<a class="pdoc-member-name" href="https://github.com/pulumi/pulumi-aws/blob/a998eb1436459bca87792641e7c9fb49e4a5e61c/sdk/nodejs/globalaccelerator/listener.ts#L127">interface <b>ListenerArgs</b></a>
</h2>
<div class="pdoc-module-contents" markdown="1">

The set of arguments for constructing a Listener resource.

<h3 class="pdoc-member-header" id="ListenerArgs-acceleratorArn">
<a class="pdoc-child-name" href="https://github.com/pulumi/pulumi-aws/blob/a998eb1436459bca87792641e7c9fb49e4a5e61c/sdk/nodejs/globalaccelerator/listener.ts#L131">property <b>acceleratorArn</b></a>
</h3>
<div class="pdoc-member-contents" markdown="1">
<pre class="highlight"><span class='kd'></span>acceleratorArn: <a href='https://pulumi.io/reference/pkg/nodejs/@pulumi/pulumi/#Input'>pulumi.Input</a>&lt;<span class='kd'><a href='https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/String'>string</a></span>&gt;;</pre>

The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of your accelerator.

</div>
<h3 class="pdoc-member-header" id="ListenerArgs-clientAffinity">
<a class="pdoc-child-name" href="https://github.com/pulumi/pulumi-aws/blob/a998eb1436459bca87792641e7c9fb49e4a5e61c/sdk/nodejs/globalaccelerator/listener.ts#L135">property <b>clientAffinity</b></a>
</h3>
<div class="pdoc-member-contents" markdown="1">
<pre class="highlight"><span class='kd'></span>clientAffinity?: <a href='https://pulumi.io/reference/pkg/nodejs/@pulumi/pulumi/#Input'>pulumi.Input</a>&lt;<span class='kd'><a href='https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/String'>string</a></span>&gt;;</pre>

Direct all requests from a user to the same endpoint. Valid values are `NONE`, `SOURCE_IP`. Default: `NONE`. If `NONE`, Global Accelerator uses the "five-tuple" properties of source IP address, source port, destination IP address, destination port, and protocol to select the hash value. If `SOURCE_IP`, Global Accelerator uses the "two-tuple" properties of source (client) IP address and destination IP address to select the hash value.

</div>
<h3 class="pdoc-member-header" id="ListenerArgs-portRanges">
<a class="pdoc-child-name" href="https://github.com/pulumi/pulumi-aws/blob/a998eb1436459bca87792641e7c9fb49e4a5e61c/sdk/nodejs/globalaccelerator/listener.ts#L139">property <b>portRanges</b></a>
</h3>
<div class="pdoc-member-contents" markdown="1">
<pre class="highlight"><span class='kd'></span>portRanges: <a href='https://pulumi.io/reference/pkg/nodejs/@pulumi/pulumi/#Input'>pulumi.Input</a>&lt;<a href='https://pulumi.io/reference/pkg/nodejs/@pulumi/pulumi/#Input'>pulumi.Input</a>&lt;{
    fromPort: <a href='https://pulumi.io/reference/pkg/nodejs/@pulumi/pulumi/#Input'>pulumi.Input</a>&lt;<span class='kd'><a href='https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/Number'>number</a></span>&gt;;
    toPort: <a href='https://pulumi.io/reference/pkg/nodejs/@pulumi/pulumi/#Input'>pulumi.Input</a>&lt;<span class='kd'><a href='https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/Number'>number</a></span>&gt;;
}&gt;[]&gt;;</pre>

The list of port ranges for the connections from clients to the accelerator. Fields documented below.

</div>
<h3 class="pdoc-member-header" id="ListenerArgs-protocol">
<a class="pdoc-child-name" href="https://github.com/pulumi/pulumi-aws/blob/a998eb1436459bca87792641e7c9fb49e4a5e61c/sdk/nodejs/globalaccelerator/listener.ts#L143">property <b>protocol</b></a>
</h3>
<div class="pdoc-member-contents" markdown="1">
<pre class="highlight"><span class='kd'></span>protocol: <a href='https://pulumi.io/reference/pkg/nodejs/@pulumi/pulumi/#Input'>pulumi.Input</a>&lt;<span class='kd'><a href='https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/String'>string</a></span>&gt;;</pre>

The protocol for the connections from clients to the accelerator. Valid values are `TCP`, `UDP`.

</div>
</div>

</div>
<h3 class="pdoc-member-header" id="ListenerState-clientAffinity">
<a class="pdoc-child-name" href="https://github.com/pulumi/pulumi-aws/blob/a998eb1436459bca87792641e7c9fb49e4a5e61c/sdk/nodejs/globalaccelerator/listener.ts#L113">property <b>clientAffinity</b></a>
</h3>
<div class="pdoc-member-contents" markdown="1">
<pre class="highlight"><span class='kd'></span>clientAffinity?: <a href='https://pulumi.io/reference/pkg/nodejs/@pulumi/pulumi/#Input'>pulumi.Input</a>&lt;<span class='kd'><a href='https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/String'>string</a></span>&gt;;</pre>

Direct all requests from a user to the same endpoint. Valid values are `NONE`, `SOURCE_IP`. Default: `NONE`. If `NONE`, Global Accelerator uses the "five-tuple" properties of source IP address, source port, destination IP address, destination port, and protocol to select the hash value. If `SOURCE_IP`, Global Accelerator uses the "two-tuple" properties of source (client) IP address and destination IP address to select the hash value.

</div>
